statements: SELECT * FROM mutations;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE mutation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'missense';
SELECT gene_name, disease_association FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type = 'frameshift';
SELECT mutation_id, gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations ORDER BY gene_name DESC, mutation_id ASC;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutations WHERE mutation_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1' AND mutation_type = 'missense';
SELECT DISTINCT disease_association FROM mutations ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, COUNT(*) FROM mutations GROUP BY gene_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM mutations WHERE mutation_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY mutation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM disease_information;
SELECT disease_name, mutation_id FROM disease_information ORDER BY mutation_id DESC;
SELECT disease_name, mutation_id FROM disease_information WHERE disease_name='Cancer';
SELECT * FROM disease_information WHERE mutation_id < 1000;
SELECT disease_name, COUNT(*) AS total_mutations FROM disease_information GROUP BY disease_name;
SELECT * FROM disease_information WHERE disease_id = 1;
SELECT disease_name, mutation_name, chromosome_number FROM disease_information JOIN mutation_data ON disease_information.mutation_id = mutation_data.mutation_id;
SELECT disease_name, gene_name, effect_on_gene FROM disease_information JOIN mutation_data ON disease_information.mutation_id = mutation_data.mutation_id WHERE effect_on_gene IS NOT NULL;
SELECT disease_name, gene_name, chromosome_number FROM disease_information JOIN mutation_data ON disease_information.mutation_id = mutation_data.mutation_id WHERE chromosome_number > 20;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS number_of_diseases FROM disease_information;
SELECT * FROM mutations;
SELECT id, gene, disease FROM mutations WHERE mutation_type='Substitution';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, mutation_id, diagnosis_date FROM mutation_history WHERE patient_id=1001;
SELECT id, gene, disease FROM mutations ORDER BY gene ASC;
SELECT * FROM mutations ORDER BY gene DESC, id ASC;
SELECT mutation_type, disease FROM mutations WHERE gene='TP53';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT mutations.gene, patients.patient_name, mutation_history.diagnosis_date FROM mutations JOIN mutation_history ON mutations.id = mutation_history.mutation_id JOIN patients ON patients.patient_id = mutation_history.patient_id;

SELECT patients.patient_name, mutations.gene, mutation_history.diagnosis_date FROM patients LEFT JOIN mutation_history ON patients.patient_id = mutation_history.patient_id LEFT JOIN mutations ON mutations.id = mutation_history.mutation_id WHERE mutations.gene LIKE 'BRAF%';
SELECT * FROM disease;
SELECT disease_name FROM disease WHERE disease_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT gene_name, mutation_type FROM mutation WHERE mutation_description LIKE '%pathogenic%';
SELECT patient_id, mutation_id FROM patient_mutation WHERE patient_id = 3 OR mutation_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM disease;
SELECT disease_name, disease_id FROM disease ORDER BY disease_id DESC;
SELECT mutation_description, gene_name FROM mutation WHERE gene_name='BRCA1';
SELECT * FROM patient WHERE age > 30 AND gender='FEMALE';

SELECT patient.patient_name, mutation.mutation_id FROM patient JOIN patient_mutation ON patient.patient_id = patient_mutation.patient_id JOIN mutation ON mutation.mutation_id = patient_mutation.mutation_id;
SELECT * FROM Disease;
SELECT disease_name FROM Disease ORDER BY disease_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Mutation WHERE mutation_type='Insertion';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patient WHERE disease_id=2;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name FROM Clinical_Trial ORDER BY trial_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Disease;
SELECT disease_id, disease_name FROM Disease WHERE disease_id = 1;
SELECT mutation_name, mutation_type FROM Mutation WHERE mutation_type = 'substitution';
SELECT * FROM Patient WHERE disease_id = (SELECT disease_id FROM Disease WHERE disease_name = 'Cancer');
SELECT trial_id, trial_name FROM Clinical_Trial ORDER BY trial_name DESC;
